_header: After that the apple was eaten
_description: Adam’s Fall — one long couplet in John Grimestone’s sermon book

NLS18721.Transcription:
After þata þe appel was eten withouten detȝ passed non of
                    alleAllas for þat wrecched hap þat to mankinde was
                    falle
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 31.
